Keystroke Pro is a leading outsourcing expert in Audio Transcription and Accounting Services.\xa0

We provide a rapid turnaround within a totally secure and confidential environment and are certified by the British Standards Institution (BSI) to their toughest information security standard. Our highly skilled professionals transform your operations and give you great flexibility. Your relationship with Keystroke Pro will unlock significant efficiencies.

Every client is different and we fully understand this. We take a consultative approach resulting in a bespoke services meeting your objectives and requirements. Through first class services and total quality we develop a meaningful and close partnership with out clients.

Keystroke Pro owes its suxxess through client relationship built on quality, service and risk management.

Forms Processing / Data Capture
Whether you need names/addresses/contact details/bank details/pledge amounts captured from a charity phone-in or you have thousands of fax/post back forms from a marketing campaign that you need put into a data base, KeyStroke have the relevant experience to turn around your project successfully, quickly and economically.
Contact us for more information.

In-House Documentation
KeyStroke Pro have a wealth of experience in re-formatting in-house documentation to reflect your updated house styles to produce a uniform, corporate standard and appearance throughout your company's paper work. Using the services of KeyStroke Pro to perform such projects will save you both time and money and allows your own staff to concentrate on their core activities.
Contact us for more information.

Copy Typing
If you have hand written manuscripts or may be a publication that you want typed up as a word document why not scan it, email it to us and have us do the typing. KeyStroke Pro have many customers who use this service, ranging from Employment Agents having candidate CVs reformatted to reflect a standard layout to oil companies wanting instruction manuals re-keyed.
Contact us for more information.

Document Conversion & Tagging
KeyStroke can perform tasks such as Quark tagging, directory editing, list compilation, web mining, data base de-duping and cleaning,
Contact us for more information.

General
If you have some work that you need doing that involves the use of a keyboard then the chances are that KeyStroke Pro would be able to do it for you saving you time, money and effort. Why not contact us and ask.

Keystroke Pro are proud to be certified by the British Standards Institution to their toughest\xa0 information security standard ISO/IEC 27001:2005 - Information Security Systems.

ISO/IEC 27001:2005 specifies the requirements for establishing, implementing, operating, monitoring, reviewing, maintaining and improving a documented Information Security Management System within the context of Keystroke Pro's overall business risks. It specifies the requirements for the implementation of security controls customized to the needs of an individual organization.

ISO/IEC 27001:2005 is designed to ensure the selection of adequate and proportionate security controls that protect information assets and give confidence to interested parties. Keystroke Pro gained the certification in 2007 and greatly value the relationship with BSI -one of the foremost certification bodies in the world. As part of the certification we have developed a System Specific Security Policy (SSSP) which we are happy to share with clients. We believe that our rigorous processes and this certification help ensure that all client data remain totally secure. Furthermore this is an important check to verify that no data ever leaves the safety of Keystroke Pro information technology equipment.

Audio Transcription
Keystroke Pro is an outsourced secretarial provider. We provide urgent and accurate transcription of digital dictation within a secure and confidential environment.
Our systems are tailored to your needs so you are guaranteed an excellent and easy-to-use service whatever your systems and workflow.
If you are using Voice File or Case Management Software, we can securely interface with your systems to provide a seamless typing service. Our IT development team is always available to give help and advice.

THE KEYSTROKE PRO ADVANTAGE

  • Guaranteed accuracy
  • Guaranteed turnaround times
  • Urgent service
  • Average savings of over 60%
  • Delivering a quality reliable service
  • Reduced billing cycles
  • Reduced work in progress
  • Flexibility with erratic typing volumes
  • No more staff absence
  • Variable rather than fixed costs
  • We work on your document templates
  • We can fully integrate with your case management systems
  • We can be set up as a typist within your voice file handling systems and process your work as if we were in your office
\r\n

Our tried and tested document production and typing service has been developed and honed for use by the Legal sector. Typical word processing undertaken includes Attendance Notes,\xa0 Letters, Statements, Wills, Case notes, File Notes, Client Instructions, Proofs of Evidence,\xa0 Briefs, Witness Statements, Instructions to Experts, Telephone-Logs and Leases, to name but a few.

Digital Voice files are transmitted to us via secure bespoke email, through the secure upload facility, or through VPN connection to your voice file handling software. We can be set up as a typist within your voice file handling software. We assign a team of professional typists to type and quality check your documents. Your files will then have a complete second check before being returning to you as a perfect document ready for printing on your letterhead or filing.

All your typing is done by permanent Keystroke Pro staff working from our secure offices on our I.T. equipment. We do not outsource your work to homeworkers or third parties.

We take confidentiality and security very seriously and are one of the few transcription companies to be certified by the British standards Institution (BSI).

Contact us for more information.

Case Study

A 250 strong Law firm in London with 3 offices was keen to use an outsourced typing facility to help control its erratic peaks of work flow and endless delays in typing brought about by the loss of several of their more reliable and productive support staff. They were also keen to take the opportunity to investigate potential cost savings. A firm wide roll-out of digital dictation had just been successfully completed.

Following a meeting with KeyStroke Pro it was agreed that a free trial would be run.

After just one week of running a trial of KeyStroke Pro's typing service they were so impressed with turnaround, quality and the pending cost savings that they signed up for the service. Starting with the processing of Attendance Notes they rapidly expanded the work to include all other legal typing.

Feedback from all levels indicates that the project has been a huge success and the relationship will continue to grow and be long and meaningful. Support staff have more time available to concentrate on urgent issues, are being promoted to Paralegals and are more productive. Fee earners are enjoying reduced error rates, are saving themselves valuable time checking and proof reading documents and have quicker turn around time of their
documents leading to satisfied clients and quicker and more accurate billing. They have not had to concern themselves with taking on temporary staff for over 12 months and have no issues coping with natural wastage of staff, holidays or absenteeism brought about through illness.

Savings in the last year have reportedly amounted to in excess of \xa3180,000. The company has been able to halve the number of extra support staff they originally planned to employ; savings are forecasted to more than double in the next 12 months.

We regularly type in excess of 100 hours of dictation per month for this client and receive several referrals a year from them.

Keystroke Pro's Financial Division is tasked with transcribing Investor Relation Conferences and Corporate Conferences.

Reading a transcript of a Corporate Conference rather than attending them or listening to web casts saves real time. You need to know that the transcript is accurate and is available in a timely fashion to ensure that you are kept up to date with market intelligence.

If you would like to talk to someone from the Financial Division please

\xa0

contact us for more information

We are Medical Transcription and Document Management experts. Our service provides total control over the whole process from creation of the dictation, to delivery of the voice file, to the document production and quality control, to return of the work and uploading into the clients' systems.

KeyStroke Pro are certified to ISO/IEC 27001:2005 Information Security Systems by the British Standards Institution (BSI) and meet the US Health Insurance Portability and ccountability Act (HIPPA) requirements and guarantee The Association for Healthcare Documentation Integrity (AHDI) defined 98% ccuracy. All work is returned on a next day basis. On average we save hospitals and medical practices 55% of their transcription costs without the need for any capital investment.

KeyStroke Pro offer full medical transcription services to physician and consultant practices; primary care practices and hospitals throughout the UK and US.

Capabilities include all medical specialities as well as bespoke document requirements such as medical history,reports, discharge summaries, operative and stat reports and IMEs.

Quality, timeliness and confidentiality are at the cornerstone of our service. We offer full or partial solutions and provide cost effective systems for erratic transcription volumes. We deliver the highest quality and consistent turnarounds that our customers have come to depend on.

KeyStroke Pro has invested in its infrastructure, hardware and software architecture with security and confidentiality as the foremost concern. From encryption, mirrored IT systems and security monitoring to disaster prevention and recovery measures, KeyStroke Pro's systems meet the stringent requirements of HIPPA compliance.

We do not need to be given any personal information and can link with your systems (PAS) in order to have the patient demographics interpolated seamlessly within your systems. Contact us for more information.

Medical Fields
We offer full Medical Transcription including the following fields:

Anaesthesiology Haematology Paediatrics
Arthritis and Rheumatology Infectious Diseases Plastic Surgery

Dermatology Nephrology Psychiatry

Gastroenterology Orthopedics Surgical
General Practice Otolaryngology Urology

KeyStroke Pro offer full transcription services to those involved in writing Medico Legal and Independent Medical Exam reports. These reports can be lengthy and therefore costly to have typed in house.

Our tried and tested service has been specifically developed for use by consultants and doctors involved in writing lengthy reports. Digital Voice files are transmitted to us via protected email or through KeyStroke Pro's web site where upon your assigned highly trained medical transcriber will type and quality check the documents. A team of dedicated Quality checkers will then complete a second check before returning a perfect document to you ready for filing or printing on your letterhead.

Keystroke Pro are certified to ISO/IEC 27001:2005 - Information Security Systems and we meet the US Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPPA) requirements and guarantee The Association for Healthcare Documentation Integrity (AHDI) defined 98% accuracy. All work is returned on a next day basis.

We take confidentiality and security very seriously and are one of the few transcription companies to be certified by the British standards Institution (BSI).
Contact us for more information.

Case Study

KeyStroke Pro were approached by a busy and overworked company specialising in Independent Medical Exam report typing. It was agreed that a two week free trial of the KeyStroke Pro service would run before a more formal arrangement was made. After the trial the company was so impressed that they started using KeyStroke Pro for their overflow work. This was a difficult business to manage as there were huge and unpredictable variations in typing volumes whilst, at the same time, turn around times (TATs) had to be guaranteed. Julian Rowse, Worldwide Sales Director of KeyStroke Pro commented "at first we were concerned by the erratic nature of this client's requirements. However we were able to build a dedicated team large enough to cope with the expectation's of this client. I think it is fair to say that the client has been more than happy with the service as shown by the considerable growth in volume this clients has passed to us since we started working for them."

This client has already saved themselves eight secretaries along with the associated employment tax costs and is planning through natural staff turnover to increase the business passed to KeyStroke Pro.

Surveyors traditionally produce lengthy documents that can readily occupy support staff for several hours or days at a time. Surveyors often spend time out of the office causing bottlenecks with their workload when they return. This causes issues with having to employ extra support staff to cover for peaks, bringing in temporary staff, overloading existing staff with overtime or delaying project completions.

With much of the recordings being produced on-site, digital dictation has allowed surveyors to deploy technology to manage their workload.

KeyStroke Pro process a wide variety of work for Surveyors such as Purchase Reports, Sales Reports, House Surveys, Pitches, Structural Reports, Cost Reports, Bank Valuations, Project Management Reports and Updates, Development Studies and Feasibility's, Expert and Witness Submissions. We take confidentiality and security very seriously and are one of the few transcription companies to be certified by the British standards Institution (BSI).

Contact us for more information.


Case Study

With over 20 offices in the UK alone, not to mention offices in a further 20 countries and a staff of over 2,300 managing the typing requirements of this international surveyor was a major logistical headache. The implementation of a digital dictation system allowed the company to move voice files around their offices to alleviate some of the bottlenecks they had experienced. Life was easier but they still had challenges.

Following on from a successful pilot project of KeyStroke Pro's typing services the company decided to send all overflow dictation produced in the UK to KeyStroke Pro for overnight processing.

They have not regretted this decision. In fact, it has been embraced by their support staff and Management are now in discussion with KeyStroke Pro to explore further development and expansion of what we all hope will be a long and fruitful business relationship.

We produce all types of documents in this field ranging from short notes to reports and projects running into hundreds of pages.

Adjusters and Insurers traditionally produce lengthy documents that can readily occupy support staff for several hours or days at a time. This causes issues with having to employ extra support staff to cover for the peaks, bringing in temporary staff, overloading existing staff with overtime or delaying project completions.

With much of the recordings being produced on-site, digital dictation has not only lead to recordings that are more audible, but also allows the recordings to be transferred to the typists quicker through the deployment of modern technology.

We take confidentiality and security very seriously and are one of the few transcription companies to be certified by the British standards Institution (BSI).


Contact us for more information.


Case Study

A Chartered Loss Adjusters and Claims Management company employing over 150 staff in 14 nationally based offices were having problems in getting their typing done efficiently.

The company was struggling to cope with their daily typing requirements and a back log of work had built up. Within a matter of days KeyStroke Pro had relevant templates and instructions for returning the typed documents and the back log of dictation was cleared.

The company was able to shave a substantial amount off their typing costs. The FTP based interface for transferring voice files and word documents allows many of their more remote Adjusters and Surveyors to work from home, rather than have the cost of satellite offices and extra support staff.

Their Operations Manager said "KeyStroke Pro have revolutionised the way in which we work. Their services are tailored to our requirements, they offer excellent support and advice and we cannot imagine operating without the services provided by KeyStroke Pro".

Keystroke Pro are one of the very few outsourced typing companies to be certified to the demanding information security standard ISO/IEC 27001: 2005 - Information Security Systems. We spent eighteen months getting this certification and were duly certified in January 2007. This accreditation governs the
handling of all data and ensures comprehensive security of client sensitive information. Our System Specific Security Policy is available for review.

Rather than engage the services a local certification body we pay for the British Standards Institution (BSI) to perform the demanding certification to their toughest standards.

ISO/IEC 27001:2005 specifies the requirements for establishing, implementing, operating, monitoring, reviewing, maintaining and improving a documented Information Security Management System within the context of the organization's overall business risks. It specifies requirements for the implementation of security controls customized to the needs of individual organizations or parts thereof.

ISO/IEC 27001:2005 is designed to ensure the selection of adequate and proportionate security controls that protect information assets and give confidence to interested parties.


Our Policy

All data coming into Keystroke Pro is controlled by our sophisticated bespoke work flow and voice file handling system.

The integrity of your data is of paramount importance to you and also to us. Your voice files and documents are kept within a unique customer account environment. We offer the facility to accept encrypted voice files and can return documents encrypted to meet customer requirements.

All KeyStroke Pro staff have to sign a stringent Code of Conduct and Confidentiality Agreement. USB ports are disabled on PCs and access to removeable media (CDs, DVDs, Memory Sticks and floppy disc) is forbidden as it access to printers . Entry to our premises is controlled. At our Processing facility there is twenty four hour manned security.

KeyStroke Pro is also registered under the United Kingdom Data Protection Act 1998 - Registration number: Z539240X


KeyStroke Pro also complies with the US HIPAA Regulations.


Data Protection Act 1998


Under the Data Protection Act 1998 anyone processing personal data must comply with the eight enforceable principles of good practise. These are:

Personal data shall be processed fairly and lawfully

Personal data shall be obtained only for one or more specified and lawful purposes, and shall not be further processed in any manner incompatible with that purpose or those purposes.

Personal data shall be adequate, relevant and not excessive in relation to the purpose or purposes for which they are processed

Personal data shall be accurate and, where necessary, kept up to date

Personal data processed for any purpose or purposes shall not be kept for longer than is necessary for that purpose or those purposes

Personal data shall be processed in accordance with the rights of data subjects under this Act

Appropriate technical and organisational measures shall be taken against unauthorised or unlawful processing of personal data and against accidental loss or destruction of, or damage to, personal data

Personal data shall not be transferred to a country or territory outside the European Economic Area, unless that country or territory ensures an adequate level of protection of the rights and freedoms of data subjects in relation to the processing of personal data

KeyStroke Pro complies with these, and whilst the above apply, KeyStroke Pro will also sign additional bespoke Confidentiality Agreements/Deeds as required by individual customers.

Read the Data Protection Act 1998 [http://www.hmso.gov.uk/acts/acts1998/19980029.htm#aofs]


HIPPA Compliance


The Act defines and regulates how health information is identified and used, including standard transaction forms and code sets for communicating between providers and payers, what information, known as Protected Health Information (PHI) is to be considered private and how it must be handled, and security policies and procedures for protecting PHI.

These regulations all fall under Title II of HIPAA and are collectively known as the Administrative Simplification Compliance Act (ASCA).

An entity falls under HIPAA if it is a health plan, clearinghouse, third-party insurer, employer maintaining health records, rehabilitation center, blood, sperm or organ tissue bank, social worker or counsellor, long-term care facility, ambulance company or pharmacy. However, many more companies and services are impacted, including those who provide services or supplies to health service providers or to patients under the direction of providers.

Outside technology vendors, transcription providers, accountants, attorneys and anyone else who may come in to contact with patient information in the course of normal business dealings is also affected.

HIPAA implementation work has concentrated on defining standard transactions for use by providers and third-party payers, and creating standard definitions for health care providers, employers, health plans and individuals to use in creating patient record information. Code sets have been created to define standard
medical terms, diagnosis codes, diseases, injuries, etc. Medical procedure codes have also been defined for actions taken to prevent, diagnose, treat or manage diseases, injuries and impairments, as well as for medications, equipment, supplies and other items prescribed for treatment.

An affected organization must implement measures, policies and procedures to assure the security of any information systems that contain individually identifiable patient health information. These would be coordinated and integrated with other system configuration management practices in order to assure system
integrity when changes to system hardware or software are made. Any software purchased as a package from an outside vendor must also be compliant.

In addition, affected parties must provide a contingency plan that provides for responding to information system emergencies, including periodic backing up of data, having and testing facilities for continuing operations in the event of an emergency, and developing effective disaster recovery procedures. Computer
controls and security measures should be documented in the same manner as other policies and procedures. Each organization is also required to have a policy on workstation use. These documented instructions and procedures should delineate the proper functions to be performed and the manner in which those functions are to be performed (e.g., logging off before leaving a terminal unattended). Restrictions must be put in place to prevent unauthorized personnel from accessing information stored on the entity's computers. Facilities that use communications networks are required to protect messages containing health information when they transmit them electronically to prevent them from being intercepted and read by parties other than the intended recipient. They must also protect their information systems from intruders trying to access information from external communication points. This typically means that some form of encryption must be used to protect this information. As well, there needs to be documented policies and security features for the use of fax, e-mail, Internet, remote dictation and transcription services.

The HHS Office for Civil Rights is responsible for enforcement of the HIPAA Privacy Regulations. They maintain up to date information on their web site at http://www.hhs.gov/ocr/hipaa/.

KeyStroke Pro has developed a range of software tools to help you in processing your voice files to your required standards, templates and turnaround times.

KeyStroke Pro are experts in all forms of transcription and document production. We accept all voice files formats and work to customers' document templates and software systems. Our service is a bespoke and flexible one; we will work with our customers to design a system that meets their needs.

We will rarely start working for a customer before we have been to visit them and talk through their requirements in considerable detail. This will include going through house styles, templates and relevant software and security systems. Once these are in place the service can start. Customers can send their voice files to us as encrypted files through email or through the KeyStroke Pro bespoke Software.

Voice files will then be processed and undergo a thorough quality check which encompasses a complete relisten to the voice file. Your work will be returned either through VPN access to your system, by email or by ftp. We can return work to central administrative points, individual authors or through our customers' software systems. We also offer to encrypt your documents if required.

KeyStroke Pro will meet your requirements at the same time as giving you guaranteed agreed turnaround times. KeyStroke Pro will also save you money. The amounts of your saving will vary depending on what your staff are paid, the level of employment tax in your jurisdiction, the cost of your office space, the space allocated to each person, the productivity of your staff (this is best measured by an output test over a week or month, rather than by a stop watch test typing up a specific document), staff turnover,recruitment costs, training costs, IT costs, IT helpdesk costs, supervision costs and management costs. Keystroke Pro offers outsourced offsite Bookkeeping and Accounting services. Accountancy outsourcing is an important option available to you to reduce your administration costs and free up resources to focus on the income generating side of the business. The service offers our clients secure connection to your accounting software and remote processing of your paperwork on a daily, weekly or monthly basis. The only differences you will experience from your own directly employed staff performing these tasks are: no backlogs, timely processing, no absences and lower costs leading to greater efficiencies.
We perform the following functions:
\xa0
Invoicing Transactions
\xa0
Credit Control
\xa0

\xa0
BACS Bureau

1. Keystroke Pro will send an experienced and qualified accountant to your site to fully document all \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0your processes. This is then written up in minute detail.You will then have to sign off on this Vade \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mecum(reference guide) as it is this that we will follow.

2. Documents and invoicing instructions are either scanned by the client or sent to Keystroke Pro for \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0scanning. These documents are then uploaded on to Forum the Keystroke Pro bespoke document \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0storage system. Forum is totally secure and only you and your Keystroke Pro team have access to \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0your documents. Original documents are returned to the client.

\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Forum allows for total electronic archiving of all your source accounting documents in a well \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0organised hierarchical system. You have access to your documents whenever required. Detailed \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0document tagging and indexing is also available for complete ease of retrieval. Forum is backed up \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0hourly.

3. Documents are retrieved by your dedicated accounting team at Keystroke Pro.

4. Your Keystroke Pro team then securely log into your accounting software through a vpn connection \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0using secure 128 bit encryption. We are able to work on the widest range of accounting packages.

5. Documents are processed remotely within your system as if someone were sitting in your office.

6. Processed documents are checked by senior accountant.

In order for us to process your accounting documents we need to have access to them. This is simple secure and inexpensive. You can either scan them yourselves and upload them to Forum the Keystroke Pro secure document web store or you can send them to us for scanning, uploading and return.

For a small premium we offer tagging of your documents for greater ease of retrieval.

Once documents are uploaded to Forum they are available to you in a secure and confidential environment.

All of the Keystroke Pro team are full time employees of the company working from Keystroke Pro premises.  You will have a senior accountant acting as your point of contact. Under them will be a team of qualified  accountant to process your work.
